parameters: "Last sleepy president couldn’t have done this."
"I don’t read the news. I am the news."
"They said no. I did it backwards, blindfolded, on a scooter."
"The economy just asked for my autograph."
"I only chirp facts. Some just haven’t happened yet."
"Plans are for quitters. I’ve got pure instincts."
"Money isn’t everything. It’s just all mine."
"Approval ratings? I built the whole theme park."
"Hard questions? I dodge them in style."
"Every chirp I send makes an economist cry."
"Am I winning? Always. Even when I’m not."
"The people are smiling, and so is your bank account!"
"Economy’s thriving! Did you just invent money again?"
"Public's loving it. You’re basically a meme hero now."
"Scandal’s low. You might just survive the next headline!"
"You’re popular, rich, and not in jail. A true hat-trick!"
"Country's booming. And so is your offshore account!"
"You're on fire—but like, in a good, slightly corrupt way."
"The nation cheers. Mostly for the fries, but still."
"Approval’s rising like gas prices. Wait, that’s good?"
"Keep this up, and history books might actually be nice!"
"Yikes. People are sharpening pitchforks and chirps."
"The vibes are off. Like... historically off."
"Uh-oh. Feels like a ‘resign gracefully’ kind of moment."
"This might be your villain origin story."
"Not saying it’s bad… but it’s definitely not good."
"Sir, the nation just sent a nervous emoji."
"You might want to start packing… emotionally."
"Let’s just say history won’t be kind to this chapter."
"This isn’t looking great. Or good. Or… survivable."
"Even your lucky socks can’t fix this mess."
"Red alert! And not just because of the cap."
"BOOM! The economy just did a backflip. Investors can't stop clapping."
"Economy up! Experts credit... vibes? Either way, party at the stock exchange!"
"GDP grows 420%. Coincidence or sheer genius? You decide. We already did."
"Economy hits all-time high! Local man tries to invest in bread & gets rich."
"Economy up. Billionaires cheer. Middle class confused. Poor still poor."
"BREAKING: Economy tanks harder than a submarine made of duct tape."
"Panic! Markets fall. Stocks cry. Crypto disappears into the woods."
"Economy doing the worm underground. Is this... strategy? Or sabotage?"
"Nation’s wallet empty. Experts say, ‘Oops.’ More at 11."
"Recession hits. Politicians blame each other. A goose is also under suspicion."
"The people are cheering! One guy even named his dog after the President."
"Strong leadership or just strong vibes? Either way, things are looking up."
"Nation agrees: that chirp slapped. Morale is up, memes are thriving."
"Crowds chant, hashtags trend. Approval so high it has its own zip code."
"Strong leadership or just strong vibes? Either way, things are looking up."
"The nation claps back with applause. Approval ratings surge!"
"Even grandma liked the chirp. That’s a historic first."
"Bold move pays off. Even the opposition hit like on this one."
"Economists confused. Citizens happy. We call that a win."
"This chirp might go down in history—or at least on a T-shirt."
"Approval numbers rising faster than your uncle’s conspiracy posts."
"This move united the internet. Even the comment section is civil."
"Sources confirm: public officially vibing with this decision."
"Smart. Sharp. Slightly chaotic. Just how the people like it."
"Major win for the country. Minor boost to cap sales. Everyone wins."
"Approval rating dives faster than a cat off a kitchen counter."
"Protests sparked by... a typo? Public approval hits snooze."
"Nation confused, concerned, and mildly offended by that chirp."
"If this were a popularity contest, you just got voted off the island."
"Nation collectively cringes. Approval rating enters free fall."
"This move made grandma cancel her internet subscription. Again"
"Chirp heard around the world… and instantly regretted."
"If bad PR had a ringtone, it just played loudly."
"The nation is confused, but mostly disappointed."
"Press conferences can’t fix this. Not even memes can."
"Critics call it ‘innovatively bad.’ Supporters just vanished."
"Alien Signal Detected. Scientists urge calm, but conspiracy forums are lighting up."
"NASA confirms strange radio signal from deep space. Could it be alien memes?"
"Aliens? I’ve been saying it for YEARS. The people know I’m right. #ToldYouSo"
"Let’s create jobs by building eagle shaped like satellites! #EconBoom"
"Launching new NFT: ‘First Contact Collection.’ 10,000 pics. Limited edition."
"Welcome, President! Let’s make riches great again. I'll advice you"
"Welcome, President! Let’s make riches great again. I'll advice you"
"Keep Approval & Economy above 5. Or face the heat."
"Keep Approval & Economy above 5. Or face the heat."
"Max your wealth but don’t burn the nation doing it!"
"Max your wealth but don’t burn the nation doing it!"
"Scandal hits 5? Say bye to the big desk."
"Scandal hits 5? Say bye to the big desk."
"One chirp a day, Commander. Make it count! Balance for 11 days"
"Scientists urge calm, but conspiracy forums are lighting up."
"NASA confirms strange radio signal from deep space. Could it be alien memes?"
"Aliens? I’ve been saying it for YEARS. The people know I’m right. #ToldYouSo"
"Let’s create jobs by building eagle shaped like satellites! #EconBoom"
"Launching new NFT: ‘First Contact Collection.’ 10,000 pics. Limited edition."
"Burger joints across the country run dry on ketchup packets."
"Black market condiments surge online: $5 per sachet."
"This country was BUILT on ketchup. We’ll fix this with pride and extra fries."
"Time to fund local tomato farms. Red jobs for red sauce. #Agrinomics"
"Introducing: PRESIMATO. Luxury ketchup. Gold bottle, same old taste."
"Experimental biotech hamster the size of a golf cart spotted downtown."
"Kids love the hamster? Great. Let’s mascot it. Giant Hammy for President!"
"Sell plushies. Open a theme park. Call it Rodentland. Huge potential."
"I’m licensing the giant hamster’s image for a new crypto: ChewCoin."
"National Health Assc. 'Citizens encouraged to wear shades all day.'"
"Minor chaos as people can’t see indoors."
"Sunglasses? I never take mine off. Coolness is mandatory. #ShadeNation"
"National production push! Boost jobs, block sun. #SolarStimulus"
"Launching limited edition red cap-shaped sunglasses. Smartest ever. #Visionary"
"Hotdog Declared a Vegetable: reclassification shocks nutritionists."
"Nation unsure whether to celebrate or panic."
"Of course hotdogs are veggies. I’ve been eating healthy this whole time!"
"Time to rebrand school lunches. Hotdogs for everyone. tax write-off."
"Anonymous source claims internet will go dark next week."
"Panic buying of USB sticks and printers."
"Relax, folks. I’ve got a hotline to the Internet. We’re all good. #NoOfflineZone"
"Time to build local servers. Keep the net local, keep the jobs booming."
"Use PresiDrive™. Holds memes, emails, AND my autobiography. Only $99.99"
"A Goose Wins Local Election: as mayor after protest vote."
"Goose honks during press conference. Chaos ensues."
"That goose gets it. Maybe I’ll appoint it to my advisory board."
"Let’s build the Goose Capitol right next to the Parliament. #GooseGDP"
"Exclusive goose-branded merchandise coming. Hats, hoodies, honks."
"FlipFlop Dance Causes Mild Earthquake as Millions jump in sync doing viral dance trend."
"Just did the dance. My hips broke a window. #PowerMovesOnly"
"Fund our own national dance app: ChatterChirp. Jobs, fun, control. #AppConomy"
"Watch me dance: The PresiSlide™. Unlockable with red cap token. #ShakeItRich"
"AI Writes National Anthem Remix: Goes viral"
"Some call it inspiring. Others call it noise."
"I love it. The anthem SLAPS now. #RobotRhythm"
"National AI for National anthems. Invest in future jams. #CodeToCash"
"Dogs Learn to Use Tablets - Breakthrough in canine-tech interface!"
"Every dog gets a tablet. It’s time. We believe in pet progress. #SmartDogsRule"
"Launch CanineTech initiative. Training labs, jobs, dog dollars. #Pawductivity"
"Exclusive BarkCoin pre-sale begins now. Invest in your dog’s future. #FurRich"
